ing: 2 cups crumbled nacho cheese tortilla chips
des: "I made up this recipe by accident, but it turns out pretty good. My boyfriend loves it, and asks to make it all of the time."
ins: In a medium bowl, mix together the tortilla chips, tomato, green onion, mushrooms, and hard-cooked egg. Stir in mayonnaise, and season with salt and pepper. Serve immediately.
